description:
Based in Amsterdam, BiBS is a fashion label founded in 2019 which specializes in dungarees. 

Influenced by the practicality of functional wear and urban aesthetics, we strive to design garments that enable, empower and stimulate creativity. Sparking confidence to create, supporting creatives through functional garments and adapting to our ever changing world remains at the core of our brand. 

Our brand name ""BiBS"" finds its origin from other terms which also means ""dungaree"" such as ""bib-and-brace"" and ""bib overall"".
